attributes.action: Enact legislation forcing ALL public services, be they shops, transport, leisure facilities or tourist attractions to comply fully with the Disability Discrimination Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and furthermore, to create a system of grants or interest free loans to enable them to carry out any adaptions or alterations neccessary. It's high time the DDA was taken seriously and stopped being the laughing stock it currently is.
